Class.name: websys.SysPreferences
Class.Description: This persistent class is managed exclusively through websys.Preferences.

Property.name: AppKey
Property.Description:
String detemining a module or major part of application functionality.
Actual string depends on the context.

For example
For Columns in a table the AppKey is "COLUMN"
For Layout of a component the AppKey is "LAYOUT"

Property.name: AppSubKey
Property.Description:
String detemining sub component of a module or major part of application functionality.
Actual string depends on the context.

For example
For Columns in a table the AppSubKey is the Component Name plus the context
For Layout of a component the AppSubKey is the Component Name plus the context.

Property.name: Data
Property.Description:
Preference Data.
The structure of the data is user defined depending on the context of the preference.
In general data should be structured as nested lists.
The actual structure should be clearly documeted in the code where the data is stored.
Storage of data within any particular context should be maintained from single method.

Property.name: ObjectReference
Property.Description: This is the ID of the referenced object.

Property.name: ObjectType
Property.Description:
ObjectType.
This is used to determine the type of the object reference.

Historically we have used cryptic shorthand:

U for User.SSUser
G for User.SSGroup
it would be better to use the object name

User.SSUser
User.SSGroup etc.

Where the is no specific correspondence to an object definition,
e.g. Site then some meaningful text should be used.

Index.name: Index
Index.Description: Inverse index by all key items

Index.name: AppKey
Index.Description: index by APPKEY, APPSUBKEY - used to get a list of preferences for a specific component

Query.name: FindByAppSubKey
Query.Description: Used to find layout preferences for a specific component
Query.SqlQuery: SELECT ID,AppKey,AppSubKey,Data,ObjectReference,ObjectType FROM SysPreferences WHERE (AppSubKey = :AppSubKey AND AppKey %STARTSWITH 'LAYOUT')
